official_title: To extend the provisions of title 5, United States Code, relating to leave-transfer programs for an additional 5 years, and to modify those programs to permit transfers of sick leave in addition to annual leave.
short_title: Federal Employees Leave Sharing Act of 1993

summary.text: Federal Employees Leave Sharing Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Employees Leave Sharing Act of 1988 to extend leave-transfer programs and allow them to permit transfers of sick leave in addition to annual leave.

titles.title: Federal Employees Leave Sharing Act of 1993

To extend the provisions of title 5, United States Code, relating to leave-transfer programs for an additional 5 years, and to modify those programs to permit transfers of sick leave in addition to annual leave.
